content: written pattern for chart 4 horse facing right left handed notes - column 41 should only be worked if this is the last rightmost pattern on your shelf instructions for column 41 will be included in square brackets and italics - all single_crochet should be in back loop only - all double_crochet including ldc and rdc should be in front loop only - all odd numbered row will be worked in colour a - all even numbered row will be worked in colour b other than row 0 which will be worked in colour a - sometimes more than one stitch will be worked into the same front loop such as when a ldc follows a double_crochet or a double_crochet follows a rdc some front loops will be skipped entirely such as when a rdc follows a double_crochet if this is the first shelf in your bookcase start at row 0 if this will be worked into pre-existing crochet start at row 1b row 0 in colour a ch41 ch1 turn your work 41 42 row 16 in colour b 8sc 10ldc 4sc 1ldc 3sc 1dc 1sc 4dc *1sc 1dc repeat from * 3 times 2dc 1sc row 1a starting in the second chain from the hook single_crochet in every chain 40 41 go to row 2 row 17 in colour a 8dc 12sc 2dc 2sc 2dc 1sc 1dc 4sc *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc row 1b in colour a 40sc 1sc 40 41 row 18 in colour b 11sc 10ldc 1sc 1rdc 3sc 1dc 1sc 4dc from this point the work should not be turned all row *1sc 3dc repeat from * 2 times 1sc should be worked from left to right on the same side the stitch count of every row should be 40 41 row 19 in colour a 11dc 12sc 3dc 1sc 1dc 4sc *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc row 2 in colour b single_crochet in every stitch row 20 in colour b 13sc 8ldc 5sc 1dc 1sc 4dc *1sc 3dc row 3 in colour a 8dc 19sc 1dc 4sc *1dc 3sc repeat repeat from * 2 times 1sc from * 2 times 1dc row 21 in colour a 10dc 1sc 2dc 9sc 2dc 3sc 1dc 4sc row 4 in colour b 7sc 2rdc 3sc *1dc 1sc repeat from * 9 *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc times 1sc 1dc **1sc 3dc repeat from ** 2 times 1sc row 22 in colour b 11sc 1ldc 5rdc 3sc 3dc 1sc 1rdc 1sc row 5 in colour a 7dc 2sc 3dc *1sc 1dc repeat from * 9 1dc 1sc 4dc *1sc 3dc repeat from * 2 times 1sc times 1dc 1sc **1dc 3sc repeat from ** 2 times 1dc row 23 in colour a 10dc 1sc 1ldc 5sc 3dc 5sc 1dc 1sc row 6 in colour b 7sc 2dc 17sc 1dc 1sc 4dc *1sc 1dc 1dc 4sc *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc repeat from * 3 times
